cards.text:
## INTANGAMARARA Y'INKURU  
Guhanahana amakuru muburyo bukomeye biba biciye munkuru. Amakuru n'ibigaragara (des faits), ukwavyonyene, bishobora kugora gutahura, kwibuka canke gusangira. Iyo utanze amakuru ata nkuru irimwo, ivyo watunganije bishobora kugora abagukurikirana gutahura kandi ntibibakoreko. Ukumenyeshamakuru kwiza kuyagira (engage) umutima n'ubwenge biciye munkuru ivuzwe neza.

Muriki gice, tuzokwereka ibintu nkenerwa bigize inkuru ivuzwe neza. Niyaba inkuru yawe ifise izi ntambwe zose, bihinguye neza, uzoba ufise inkuru ikomeye gose ishobora cane gushirwa murwego ruhambaye rwo kumenshamakuru.
